This document is Invoice #1001, issued by Skyline Corp to Client 1 on 2024-01-24.

The invoice details the purchase of six different types of items for a grand total of 199022.

The items included in the purchase are:
1. HDD (8 units)
2. Monitor (10 units and 4 units, listed separately)
3. Router (4 units)
4. Scanner (6 units)
5. Ink Cartridge (6 units)

The total number of units purchased across all line items is 38. The total billed amount is 199022. The largest line item by cost is the 10 units of Monitor totaling 73950.
